header.title: FAQ Manager
header.description: Adds an easy to use FAQ Manager to the ACP.

changelog.change: Now there are no file edits needed.
Well, wouldn't you know it, we do need that file edit because loading the language file afterwards doesn't work as I thought it would! :(.
Bug fix for loading other languages.
I have rebuilt the entire system because of some limitations and bugs that needed to be fixed.
A function that was used did not support PHP4, that has been fixed now.
Was not properly decoding HTML Entities or escaping single quotes.
Now there are no file edits needed! No need to upgrade if you've already installed it.
A few misc changes to clean up the code a bit (notes from the Mod Team). To update from 1.2.0 just upload the new files.

From a suggestion by ChriZathens, the file find function now searches for files within directories inside of the language directory. To update from 1.2.1 just upload the new includes/acp/acp_faq_manager.php file.

Fixing 2 bugs, one with the blank page after selecting No to delete an item, and the other with not being able to add categories if there is nothing in the FAQ file. To upgrade from 1.2.2 just upload the files.
Ok, I do not know what happened last time, seems that the files from 1.2.2 were used in the package. Fixed that and also found and fixed a bug while doing so.
Fixing a bug with quotes when editing the title.
To update from 1.2.4 upload the root/includes/acp/acp_faq_manager.php file to includes/acp/acp_faq_manager.php.
To update from 1.2.5 upload the root/includes/acp/acp_faq_manager.php file to includes/acp/acp_faq_manager.php.

action-group.diy-instructions: Run the faq_manager.php file from your browser to install the FAQ Manager Module.
